verses.kjv: Doth not wisdom cry? and understanding put forth her voice?
verses.ct: Doesn't wisdom call out? Doesn't understanding raise her voice?

verses.kjv: She standeth in the top of high places, by the way in the places of the paths.
verses.ct: She takes her stand on the hilltops, beside the road where the paths meet.

verses.kjv: She crieth at the gates, at the entry of the city, at the coming in at the doors.
verses.ct: She shouts at the city gates, at every entrance, at the doorways:

verses.kjv: Unto you, O men, I call; and my voice is to the sons of man.
verses.ct: "I'm calling out to you, everyone! My voice is directed at all of humanity.

verses.kjv: O ye simple, understand wisdom: and, ye fools, be ye of an understanding heart.
verses.ct: You who are inexperienced, learn good judgment. You who are foolish, develop an understanding heart.

verses.kjv: Hear; for I will speak of excellent things; and the opening of my lips shall be right things.
verses.ct: Listen, because I have important things to say, and everything that comes from my lips is honest.

verses.kjv: For my mouth shall speak truth; and wickedness is an abomination to my lips.
verses.ct: My mouth speaks what is true, because wickedness disgusts me.

verses.kjv: All the words of my mouth are in righteousness; there is nothing froward or perverse in them.
verses.ct: Every word I speak is rooted in righteousness — nothing in them is twisted or crooked.

verses.kjv: They are all plain to him that understandeth, and right to them that find knowledge.
verses.ct: They are completely clear to anyone with discernment, and straightforward to those who have gained knowledge.

verses.kjv: Receive my instruction, and not silver; and knowledge rather than choice gold.
verses.ct: Accept my teaching instead of silver; choose knowledge over the finest gold.

verses.kjv: For wisdom is better than rubies; and all the things that may be desired are not to be compared to it.
verses.ct: Wisdom is more valuable than rubies, and nothing you could ever want compares to her.

verses.kjv: I wisdom dwell with prudence, and find out knowledge of witty inventions.
verses.ct: I, wisdom, live alongside good judgment, and I possess the knowledge behind clever solutions.

verses.kjv: The fear of the LORD is to hate evil: pride, and arrogancy, and the evil way, and the froward mouth, do I hate.
verses.ct: Wholehearted dedication to the LORD means hating evil. I despise pride, arrogance, corrupt behavior, and dishonest speech.

verses.kjv: Counsel is mine, and sound wisdom: I am understanding; I have strength.
verses.ct: Good counsel belongs to me, along with reliable wisdom. I am understanding itself; I have power.

verses.kjv: By me kings reign, and princes decree justice.
verses.ct: Through me, kings govern, and rulers establish just laws.

verses.kjv: By me princes rule, and nobles, even all the judges of the earth.
verses.ct: Through me, leaders exercise authority — every noble and judge on earth.

verses.kjv: I love them that love me; and those that seek me early shall find me.
verses.ct: I love those who love me, and anyone who searches for me with dedication will find me.

verses.kjv: Riches and honour are with me; yea, durable riches and righteousness.
verses.ct: Wealth and honor come with me — lasting wealth and righteousness.

verses.kjv: My fruit is better than gold, yea, than fine gold; and my revenue than choice silver.
verses.ct: What I produce is better than gold, even the purest gold, and my yield surpasses the finest silver.

verses.kjv: I lead in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of judgment:
verses.ct: I walk along the path of righteousness, right through the middle of the road of justice,

verses.kjv: That I may cause those that love me to inherit substance; and I will fill their treasures.
verses.ct: granting real wealth to those who love me and filling their storehouses to the brim.

verses.kjv: The LORD possessed me in the beginning of his way, before his works of old.
verses.ct: The LORD brought me into being at the very start of his work, before any of his ancient acts.

verses.kjv: I was set up from everlasting, from the beginning, or ever the earth was.
verses.ct: I was established from eternity, from the very beginning, before the earth even existed.

verses.kjv: When there were no depths, I was brought forth; when there were no fountains abounding with water.
verses.ct: I was born before the ocean depths existed, before there were springs overflowing with water.

verses.kjv: Before the mountains were settled, before the hills was I brought forth:
verses.ct: Before the mountains were set in place, before the hills existed, I was born —

verses.kjv: While as yet he had not made the earth, nor the fields, nor the highest part of the dust of the world.
verses.ct: before he had made the earth or the open fields, or even the first dust of the world.

verses.kjv: When he prepared the heavens, I was there: when he set a compass upon the face of the depth:
verses.ct: When he set up the heavens, I was there. When he drew a circle on the surface of the deep,

verses.kjv: When he established the clouds above: when he strengthened the fountains of the deep:
verses.ct: when he secured the clouds above, when he made the springs of the deep flow strong,

verses.kjv: When he gave to the sea his decree, that the waters should not pass his commandment: when he appointed the foundations of the earth:
verses.ct: when he set boundaries for the sea so the waters would never go beyond his command, when he laid out the foundations of the earth —

verses.kjv: Then I was by him, as one brought up with him: and I was daily his delight, rejoicing always before him;
verses.ct: I was right beside him, like a master craftsman. Day after day I was his delight, constantly celebrating in his presence,

verses.kjv: Rejoicing in the habitable part of his earth; and my delights were with the sons of men.
verses.ct: celebrating over his inhabited world, and finding my joy among human beings.

verses.kjv: Now therefore hearken unto me, O ye children: for blessed are they that keep my ways.
verses.ct: So now, my children, listen to me, because those who follow my ways are truly happy.

verses.kjv: Hear instruction, and be wise, and refuse it not.
verses.ct: Pay attention to instruction and become wise — don't ignore it.

verses.kjv: Blessed is the man that heareth me, watching daily at my gates, waiting at the posts of my doors.
verses.ct: Happy is the person who listens to me, showing up at my doors every day, waiting at my doorposts.

verses.kjv: For whoso findeth me findeth life, and shall obtain favour of the LORD.
verses.ct: Whoever finds me finds life and receives favor from the LORD.

verses.kjv: But he that sinneth against me wrongeth his own soul: all they that hate me love death.
verses.ct: But whoever sins against me damages their own soul. Everyone who hates me is in love with death."
